did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York State College of Human Ecology.Family Life Development Center.

did.physdesc: Manuals, videotapes, DVDs, CDs, booklets, manuscripts, dolls
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Historical information, guides and manuals, booklets, teaching material, curricula, and drafts of a text on family life; includes five anatomical dolls formerly used in child abuse cases, and articles representing opposing opinions on the use of dolls and material from the Child Protective Services Training Institute. Also, videtapes of Professor James Garbarino appearing on television discussing youth and guns.

Also seven DVDs and one leaflet relating to the conference: The Immigrant Child: Past, Present and Future which was put on by the Family Life Development Center in the College of Human Ecology in October of 2008. Joan Jacobs Brumberg was the project director.
Also 13 DVDs of various presentations, including the Iscol Family Program for Leadership Development in Public Service.
Includes records and 10 CDs concerning the Family Life Development Center Military Projects.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State College of Human Ecology.
Iscol Family Program for Leadership Development in Public Service.

descgrp.head: INFORMATION FOR USERS
descgrp.p: Additional material and digital versions can be found online here: http://ecommons.cornell.edu/handle/1813/8130

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Family Life Development Center records, #23-13-2854. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

arrangement.head: SERIES LIST

Series I. Articles and Papers Concerning FLDC
Boxes: Box 2, folders 1, 5; Box 3, folder 1

Subseries A: Handbooks and Manuals
Boxes: Box 1, folders 1-2, 5-6, 8, 26-27; Box 2, folder 2

Subseries B: Child Protective Services Training Institute (1971-2003)
Boxes: Box 2, folder 6; Boxes 6-22

Series III. Reports/Proposals/Subject Files
Boxes: Box 1, folders 4, 7; Box 2, folders 7-8; Box 3, folders 2-3

Series IV. Reviews
Boxes: Box 1, folders 9-24; Box 3, folders 4-6

Series VI. The Military Projects

Box 27

Series VII. Dolls Used in Counseling Sessions

Series VIII. Conferences and Presentations
